species.name: gigalith
descriptions: Although its energy blasts can blow away a dump truck, they have a limitation— they can only be fired when the sun is out.
Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.
It absorbs rays of sunlight and shoots out energy. It’s usually lurking deep beneath the surface.
Known for its hefty horsepower, this Pokémon is a popular partner for construction workers.
The blasts of energy it makes from sunbeams have terrifying power. However, it’s not able to fire its blasts at night or on rainy days.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: sand-stream
abilities.effect: Summons a sandstorm that lasts indefinitely upon entering battle.

abilities.name: sand-force
abilities.effect: Strengthens rock, ground, and steel moves to 1.3× their power during a sandstorm.  Protects against sandstorm damage.
